newsitem.title: USA: NBA BASKETBALL-MIAMI'S MOURNING, BULLS' RODMAN FINED $5,000 EACH.
newsitem.headline: NBA BASKETBALL-MIAMI'S MOURNING, BULLS' RODMAN FINED $5,000 EACH.

text.p: Miami Heat centre Alonzo Mourning and Chicago Bulls forward Dennis Rodman were fined $5,000 apiece by the NBA on Wednesday for their roles in an altercation in Monday's playoff game.
The Heat beat the Bulls 87-80 Monday at Miami to stay alive in the Eastern Conference final after losing the first three game of the best-of-seven series. Game 5 is Wedesday at Chicago.
Mourning grabbed Rodman and both players went to the floor out of bounds near the baseline with 8:14 left in the fourth quarter.

Mourning ended up putting a headlock on Rodman and there were no ejections. Each player was assessed a technical foul, meaning Rodman has picked up at least one in all 12 of Chicago's playoff games this post-season.
